dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT :REPORT_TYPE eta_etd, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'MM/DD/YYYY') run_date, (SELECT location_name FROM location WHERE location_gid = :CUSTOMER_ID) customer_name, TO_CHAR((CASE WHEN :START_DATE IS NULL AND :END_DATE IS NULL THEN (CASE WHEN :REPORT_TYPE = 'ETA' THEN TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,-NVL(TO_NUMBER(( SELECT location_refnum_value FROM location_refnum WHERE location_gid = :CUSTOMER_ID AND location_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.TSC_CAR_MONTHS_BEFORE_ETA')),0))) WHEN :REPORT_TYPE = 'ETD' THEN TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,-NVL(TO_NUMBER(( SELECT location_refnum_value FROM location_refnum WHERE location_gid = :CUSTOMER_ID AND location_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.TSC_CAR_MONTHS_BEFORE_ETD')),0))) END) WHEN NOT :START_DATE IS NULL AND NOT :END_DATE IS NULL THEN NVL(TO_DATE(:START_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD'),SYSDATE) END),'MM/DD/YY') start_dt, TO_CHAR((CASE WHEN :START_DATE IS NULL AND :END_DATE IS NULL THEN (CASE WHEN :REPORT_TYPE = 'ETA' THEN TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,NVL(TO_NUMBER(( SELECT location_refnum_value FROM location_refnum WHERE location_gid = :CUSTOMER_ID AND location_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.TSC_CAR_MONTHS_AFTER_ETA')),0))) WHEN :REPORT_TYPE = 'ETD' THEN TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,NVL(TO_NUMBER(( SELECT location_refnum_value FROM location_refnum WHERE location_gid = :CUSTOMER_ID AND location_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.TSC_CAR_MONTHS_AFTER_ETD')),0))) END) WHEN NOT :START_DATE IS NULL AND NOT :END_DATE IS NULL THEN NVL(TO_DATE(:END_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD'),SYSDATE) END),'MM/DD/YY') end_dt, :SHOW_TSC tscyn, :SHOW_BOOK bookyn, :SHOW_CONS consyn, :SHOW_REF refyn, :SHOW_EQUIP equipyn, :SHOW_CAR caryn, :SHOW_VES vesyn, :SHOW_RAMP rampyn, :SHOW_PORT portyn, :SHOW_ORIG origyn, :SHOW_DISCH dischyn, :SHOW_ETD etdyn, :SHOW_ATD atdyn, :SHOW_ETA etayn, :SHOW_ATA atayn, :SHOW_STAT statyn, (CASE WHEN :START_DATE IS NULL OR :END_DATE IS NULL THEN (CASE WHEN :REPORT_TYPE = 'ETA' THEN (CASE WHEN (SELECT location_refnum_value FROM location_refnum WHERE location_gid = :CUSTOMER_ID AND location_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.TSC_CAR_MONTHS_BEFORE_ETA') IS NULL OR (SELECT location_refnum_value FROM location_refnum WHERE location_gid = :CUSTOMER_ID AND location_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.TSC_CAR_MONTHS_BEFORE_ETD') IS NULL THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END) ELSE (CASE WHEN (SELECT location_refnum_value FROM location_refnum WHERE location_gid = :CUSTOMER_ID AND location_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.TSC_CAR_MONTHS_AFTER_ETA') IS NULL OR (SELECT location_refnum_value FROM location_refnum WHERE location_gid = :CUSTOMER_ID AND location_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.TSC_CAR_MONTHS_AFTER_ETD') IS NULL THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END) END) ELSE 'Y' END) report_run FROM DUAL

SELECT DISTINCT j.job_xid job_id, j.attribute2 booking_id, loc1.location_name ultimate_consignee, j.attribute3 ref_no, (SELECT LISTAGG(TRIM(TO_CHAR(COUNT(se.s_equipment_gid),'99990')) || ' X ' || (CASE WHEN eg.equipment_group_xid = '20FT_22GP' THEN '20''' WHEN eg.equipment_group_xid = '20FT_22RE' THEN '20''''RF' WHEN eg.equipment_group_xid = '20FT_22TG' THEN '20''''ISO' WHEN eg.equipment_group_xid = '40FT_42GP' THEN '40''' WHEN eg.equipment_group_xid = '40FT_45GP' THEN '40HC' WHEN eg.equipment_group_xid = '45FT_L5GP' THEN '45''' WHEN eg.equipment_group_xid = '40FT_45RE' THEN '40''''HCRF' WHEN eg.equipment_group_xid = 'RO RO' THEN 'RORO' ELSE eg.equipment_group_xid END), ', ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY eg.equipment_group_xid) FROM shipment_s_equipment_join ssejoin INNER JOIN s_equipment se ON ssejoin.s_equipment_gid = se.s_equipment_gid INNER JOIN equipment_group eg ON se.equipment_group_gid = eg.equipment_group_gid WHERE ssejoin.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid GROUP BY eg.equipment_group_xid) equipment, loc2.location_name carrier, TRIM(cv.voyage_name || ' ' || cvr1.charter_voyage_refnum_value) vessel_voyage, cvr2.charter_voyage_refnum_value ramp_cut, cvr3.charter_voyage_refnum_value port_cut, loc3.location_name origin, loc4.location_name port_discharge, TO_CHAR(cv.departure_date,'fmMM/DD/YYYY') etd, TO_CHAR(cv.actual_departure_date,'fmMM/DD/YYYY') atd, TO_CHAR(cv.arrival_date,'fmMM/DD/YYYY') eta, TO_CHAR(cv.actual_arrival_date,'fmMM/DD/YYYY') ata, jrem.remark_text status, :SHOW_TSC tsc_yn, :SHOW_BOOK book_yn, :SHOW_CONS cons_yn, :SHOW_REF ref_yn, :SHOW_EQUIP equip_yn, :SHOW_CAR car_yn, :SHOW_VES ves_yn, :SHOW_RAMP ramp_yn, :SHOW_PORT port_yn, :SHOW_ORIG orig_yn, :SHOW_DISCH disch_yn, :SHOW_ETD etd_yn, :SHOW_ATD atd_yn, :SHOW_ETA eta_yn, :SHOW_ATA ata_yn, :SHOW_STAT stat_yn FROM job j INNER JOIN job_order_release_join jorj ON j.job_gid = jorj.job_gid INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul ON jorj.order_release_gid = ssul.order_release_gid INNER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessuj ON sessuj.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN shipment_s_equipment_join ssej ON sessuj.s_equipment_gid = ssej.s_equipment_gid INNER JOIN shipment s ON ssej.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND s.shipment_type_gid = 'TRANSPORT' AND s.transport_mode_gid = 'VESSEL-CO' AND s.is_primary = 'Y' AND s.perspective = 'B' INNER JOIN job_order_release_join jorjoin ON j.job_gid = jorjoin.job_gid INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssuline ON jorjoin.order_release_gid = ssuline.order_release_gid INNER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessujoin ON sessujoin.s_ship_unit_gid = ssuline.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN shipment_s_equipment_join ssejoin ON sessujoin.s_equipment_gid = ssejoin.s_equipment_gid INNER JOIN shipment sh ON ssejoin.shipment_gid = sh.shipment_gid AND sh.shipment_type_gid = 'TRANSPORT' AND sh.transport_mode_gid = 'VESSEL-CO' AND sh.perspective = 'S' INNER JOIN shipment_refnum sr ON s.shipment_gid = sr.shipment_gid AND sr.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'CHARTER VOYAGE' INNER JOIN charter_voyage cv ON 'SCOULAR/NVO.' || sr.shipment_refnum_value = cv.charter_voyage_gid INNER JOIN shipment_involved_party sip ON s.shipment_gid = sip.shipment_gid AND sip.involved_party_qual_gid = 'BILL-TO' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_involved_party sip1 ON s.shipment_gid = sip1.shipment_gid AND sip1.involved_party_qual_gid = 'ULTIMATE CONSIGNEE' LEFT OUTER JOIN location loc1 ON sip1.involved_party_contact_gid = loc1.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN location loc2 ON s.servprov_gid = loc2.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN charter_voyage_refnum cvr1 ON cv.charter_voyage_gid = cvr1.charter_voyage_gid AND cvr1.charter_voyage_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CHARVOY_VOYAGE_NUMBER' LEFT OUTER JOIN charter_voyage_refnum cvr2 ON cv.charter_voyage_gid = cvr2.charter_voyage_gid AND cvr2.charter_voyage_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CHARVOY_START RAMP CUTOFF TIME' LEFT OUTER JOIN charter_voyage_refnum cvr3 ON cv.charter_voyage_gid = cvr3.charter_voyage_gid AND cvr3.charter_voyage_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CHARVOY_START PORT CUTOFF TIME' LEFT OUTER JOIN location loc3 ON sh.source_location_gid = loc3.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN location loc4 ON sh.dest_location_gid = loc4.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN job_remark jrem ON j.job_gid = jrem.job_gid AND jrem.remark_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.EXPORT ACTIVITY NOTES_EXTERNAL' WHERE j.domain_name = 'SCOULAR/NVO' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT js.status_value_gid FROM job_status js WHERE js.status_type_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.JOB_CANCELLED' AND js.status_value_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.JOB_CANCELLED' AND js.job_gid = j.job_gid) AND ((:REPORT_TYPE = 'ETD' AND (:START_DATE IS NULL AND :END_DATE IS NULL AND ((TO_DATE(cv.departure_date,'dd-mm-rr') >= TO_DATE(TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,-NVL(TO_NUMBER(( SELECT location_refnum_value FROM location_refnum WHERE location_gid = :CUSTOMER_ID AND location_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.TSC_CAR_MONTHS_BEFORE_ETD')),0)))) AND TO_DATE(cv.departure_date,'dd-mm-rr') <= TO_DATE(TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,NVL(TO_NUMBER(( SELECT location_refnum_value FROM location_refnum WHERE location_gid = :CUSTOMER_ID AND location_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.TSC_CAR_MONTHS_AFTER_ETA')),0))))) OR (TO_DATE(cv.actual_departure_date,'dd-mm-rr') >= TO_DATE(TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,-NVL(TO_NUMBER(( SELECT location_refnum_value FROM location_refnum WHERE location_gid = :CUSTOMER_ID AND location_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.TSC_CAR_MONTHS_BEFORE_ETD')),0)))) AND TO_DATE(cv.actual_departure_date,'dd-mm-rr') <= TO_DATE(TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,NVL(TO_NUMBER(( SELECT location_refnum_value FROM location_refnum WHERE location_gid = :CUSTOMER_ID AND location_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.TSC_CAR_MONTHS_AFTER_ETA')),0)))))) OR (NOT :START_DATE IS NULL AND NOT :END_DATE IS NULL AND ((TO_DATE(cv.departure_date,'dd-mm-rr') >= TO_DATE(:START_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(cv.departure_date,'dd-mm-rr') <= TO_DATE(:END_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD')) OR (TO_DATE(cv.actual_departure_date,'dd-mm-rr') >= TO_DATE(:START_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(cv.actual_departure_date,'dd-mm-rr') <= TO_DATE(:END_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD')))))) OR (:REPORT_TYPE = 'ETA' AND ((:START_DATE IS NULL AND :END_DATE IS NULL AND ((TO_DATE(cv.arrival_date,'dd-mm-rr') >= TO_DATE(TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,-NVL(TO_NUMBER(( SELECT location_refnum_value FROM location_refnum WHERE location_gid = :CUSTOMER_ID AND location_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.TSC_CAR_MONTHS_BEFORE_ETA')),0)))) AND TO_DATE(cv.arrival_date,'dd-mm-rr') <= TO_DATE(TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,NVL(TO_NUMBER(( SELECT location_refnum_value FROM location_refnum WHERE location_gid = :CUSTOMER_ID AND location_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.TSC_CAR_MONTHS_AFTER_ETA')),0))))) OR (TO_DATE(cv.actual_arrival_date,'dd-mm-rr') >= TO_DATE(TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,-NVL(TO_NUMBER(( SELECT location_refnum_value FROM location_refnum WHERE location_gid = :CUSTOMER_ID AND location_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.TSC_CAR_MONTHS_BEFORE_ETA')),0)))) AND TO_DATE(cv.actual_arrival_date,'dd-mm-rr') <= TO_DATE(TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,NVL(TO_NUMBER(( SELECT location_refnum_value FROM location_refnum WHERE location_gid = :CUSTOMER_ID AND location_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.TSC_CAR_MONTHS_AFTER_ETA')),0)))))) OR (NOT :START_DATE IS NULL AND NOT :END_DATE IS NULL AND ((TO_DATE(cv.arrival_date,'dd-mm-rr') >= TO_DATE(:START_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(cv.arrival_date,'dd-mm-rr') <= TO_DATE(:END_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD')) OR (TO_DATE(cv.actual_arrival_date,'dd-mm-rr') >= TO_DATE(:START_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(cv.actual_arrival_date,'dd-mm-rr') <= TO_DATE(:END_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD')))))))) AND sip.involved_party_contact_gid = :CUSTOMER_ID ORDER BY j.job_xid
